thread.title: President Trump to skip trip to Palm Beach this weekend, report says
thread.title_full: President Trump to skip trip to Palm Beach this weekend, report says - Sun Sentinel

author: Dan Sweeney
title: President Trump to skip trip to Palm Beach this weekend, report says

organizations.name: donald trump honda classic cleveland clinic federal aviation administration

text:
Instead of coming to his Weekend White House at Mar-a-Lago, it appears President Donald Trump will spend this weekend in Washington, D.C.
Trump “is planning on staying in Washington next weekend to prepare for his first joint address to Congress” on Feb. 28, CNN reported Tuesday.
The Federal Aviation Administration has not posted its warning banning certain types of flights, such as flight training and sky banners, from the area around Mar-a-Lago.
For the past three weekends when Trump came to Palm Beach, warnings were posted by this point in the week.
Caption The debate over President Trump’s mental health The New York Times published a letter signed by 35 psychiatrists, psychologists and social workers. The letter suggests Trump’s “grave emotional instability… makes him incapable of serving safely as president.” (Feb. 21, 2017)
The New York Times published a letter signed by 35 psychiatrists, psychologists and social workers. The letter suggests Trump’s “grave emotional instability… makes him incapable of serving safely as president.” (Feb. 21, 2017)

Caption Alex Acosta named as new Labor secretary nominee Florida International University law school dean R. Alexander Acosta has been named President Donald Trump's new choice for secretary of labor.
Florida International University law school dean R. Alexander Acosta has been named President Donald Trump's new choice for secretary of labor.
Caption Trump Goes On Offensive In Solo Press Conference CBS Miami’s Eliott Rodriguez reports.
CBS Miami’s Eliott Rodriguez reports.
Caption Andy Puzder withdraws as Labor secretary nominee amid Republican opposition Puzder’s confirmation hearing was delayed four times over eight weeks.
Puzder’s confirmation hearing was delayed four times over eight weeks.
Caption President Trump's fluctuation on Israel Trump backed down on U.S. support for two-state solution for Israel after initially taking hard-line positions by refusing to condemn the expansion of settlements in West Bank land claimed by the Palestinians and vowing to move the U.S. Embassy from Tel Aviv to Jerusalem.
Trump backed down on U.S. support for two-state solution for Israel after initially taking hard-line positions by refusing to condemn the expansion of settlements in West Bank land claimed by the Palestinians and vowing to move the U.S. Embassy from Tel Aviv to Jerusalem.
Mar-a-Lago has a benefit gala this weekend for the Cleveland Clinic , and the professional golf event the Honda Classic is taking place at the PGA National course in Palm Beach Gardens through Sunday.
Trump, reportedly a scratch golfer with a keen interest in the sport, has taken criticism over the hypocrisy of his golfing habit recently.
During the campaign, Trump criticized Barack Obama on numerous occasions for the frequency of the then-president’s duffing.
“I'm not going to have time to go play golf,” he promised a crowd at a Virginia event in August.
But the Washington Post reported that Trump has averaged about a round of golf per week since becoming president. He’s played at his courses in West Palm Beach and Jupiter.
A White House spokeswoman, Sarah Huckabee Sanders, said Trump had “played a couple of holes” this past weekend until the sports blog No Laying Up reported that Trump played a full 18 holes with pro golfer Rory McIlroy.
